verses.verse: And as he <S%G1607>went<s%> out of the <S%G2411>temple,<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G1320>Master,<s%> <S%G2396>see<s%> <S%G4217>what<s%> <S%G4217>manner<s%> of <S%G3037>stones<s%> and <S%G4217>what<s%> <S%G3619>buildings<s%> are <S%G5602>here!<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answering<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G991>See<s%> you <S%G5025>these<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3619>buildings?<s%> there shall not be <S%G863>left<s%> one <S%G3037>stone<s%> on another, that shall not be <S%G2647>thrown<s%> down. <S%G2647><s%>

And as he <S%G2521>sat<s%> on the <S%G3735>mount<s%> of <S%G1636>Olives<s%> <S%G2713>over<s%> <S%G2713>against<s%> the <S%G2411>temple,<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> and <S%G2385>James<s%> and <S%G2491>John<s%> and <S%G406>Andrew<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> him <S%G2596>privately,<s%>

<S%G2036>Tell<s%> us, <S%G4218>when<s%> shall <S%G5023>these<s%> things be? and <S%G5101>what<s%> shall be the <S%G4592>sign<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things shall be <S%G4931>fulfilled?<s%>
And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answering<s%> them <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G3004>say,<s%> Take <S%G991>heed<s%> <S%G3361>lest<s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man <S%G4105>deceive<s%> you:
For <S%G4183>many<s%> shall <S%G2064>come<s%> in my <S%G3686>name,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> Christ; and shall <S%G4105>deceive<s%> many. <S%G4183><s%>

And <S%G3752>when<s%> you shall <S%G191>hear<s%> of <S%G4171>wars<s%> and <S%G189>rumors<s%> of <S%G4171>wars,<s%> be you not <S%G2360>troubled:<s%> for such things <S%G1163>must<s%> needs be; but the end <S%G5056><s%> shall not be yet. <S%G3768><s%>

For <S%G1484>nation<s%> shall <S%G1453>rise<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> <S%G1484>nation,<s%> and <S%G932>kingdom<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> <S%G932>kingdom:<s%> and there shall be <S%G4578>earthquakes<s%> in divers <S%G5117>places,<s%> and there shall be <S%G3042>famines<s%> and <S%G5016>troubles:<s%> these <S%G5023><s%> are the <S%G746>beginnings<s%> of sorrows. <S%G5604><s%>

But take <S%G991>heed<s%> to <S%G1438>yourselves:<s%> for they shall <S%G3860>deliver<s%> you up to <S%G4892>councils;<s%> and in the <S%G4864>synagogues<s%> you shall be <S%G1194>beaten:<s%> and you shall be <S%G2476>brought<s%> <S%G1909>before<s%> <S%G2232>rulers<s%> and <S%G935>kings<s%> for my <S%G1752>sake,<s%> for a <S%G3142>testimony<s%> against them.
And the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> be <S%G2784>published<s%> <S%G1519>among<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> nations. <S%G1484><s%>

But <S%G3752>when<s%> they shall lead <S%G71><s%> you, and <S%G3860>deliver<s%> you up, take <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G4305>thought<s%> <S%G4305>beforehand<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> you shall <S%G2980>speak,<s%> <S%G3366>neither<s%> do you <S%G3191>premeditate:<s%> but whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> shall be <S%G1325>given<s%> you in that <S%G5610>hour,<s%> that <S%G2980>speak<s%> you: for it is not you that <S%G2980>speak,<s%> but the <S%G40>Holy<s%> Ghost. <S%G4151><s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> the <S%G80>brother<s%> shall <S%G3860>betray<s%> the <S%G80>brother<s%> to <S%G2288>death,<s%> and the <S%G3962>father<s%> the <S%G5043>son;<s%> and <S%G5043>children<s%> shall <S%G1881>rise<s%> up against <S%G1909><s%> their <S%G1118>parents,<s%> and shall <S%G2289>cause<s%> them to be <S%G2289>put<s%> to death. <S%G2289><s%>

And you shall be <S%G3404>hated<s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> men for my <S%G3686>name's<s%> sake: but he that shall <S%G5278>endure<s%> to the <S%G5056>end,<s%> the <S%G3778>same<s%> shall be saved. <S%G4982><s%>

But <S%G3752>when<s%> you shall <S%G1492>see<s%> the <S%G946>abomination<s%> of <S%G2050>desolation,<s%> <S%G4483>spoken<s%> of by <S%G1158>Daniel<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet,<s%> <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> it <S%G1163>ought<s%> not, (let him that <S%G314>reads<s%> understand, <S%G3539><s%> ) <S%G5119>then<s%> let them that be in <S%G2449>Judaea<s%> <S%G5343>flee<s%> to the mountains: <S%G3735><s%>

And let him that is <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1430>housetop<s%> not <S%G2597>go<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3614>house,<s%> <S%G3366>neither<s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> therein, to <S%G142>take<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> thing out of his house: <S%G3614><s%>
And let him that is in the <S%G68>field<s%> not <S%G1994>turn<s%> <S%G617>back<s%> <S%G1994>again<s%> for to <S%G142>take<s%> up his garment. <S%G2440><s%>
But <S%G3759>woe<s%> to them that are with child, <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1064><s%> <S%G2192><s%> and to them that give <S%G2337>suck<s%> in <S%G1565>those<s%> days! <S%G2250><s%>
And <S%G4336>pray<s%> you that <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5437>flight<s%> be not in the winter. <S%G5494><s%>

For in <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> shall be <S%G2347>affliction,<s%> <S%G3634>such<s%> as was not from the <S%G746>beginning<s%> of the <S%G2937>creation<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2936>created<s%> to <S%G3568>this<s%> <S%G3568>time,<s%> neither <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3361><s%> shall be.

And <S%G1508>except<s%> that the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> had <S%G2856>shortened<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> no <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3956><s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> should be <S%G4982>saved:<s%> but for the <S%G1588>elect's<s%> sake, <S%G3739>whom<s%> he has <S%G1586>chosen,<s%> he has <S%G2856>shortened<s%> the days. <S%G2250><s%>

And <S%G5119>then<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> man shall <S%G2036>say<s%> to you, <S%G2400>See,<s%> here <S%G5602><s%> is <S%G5547>Christ;<s%> <S%G2228>or,<s%> see, <S%G2400><s%> he is <S%G1563>there;<s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> him not:

For <S%G5580>false<s%> <S%G5580>Christs<s%> and <S%G5578>false<s%> <S%G5578>prophets<s%> shall <S%G1453>rise,<s%> and shall <S%G1325>show<s%> <S%G4592>signs<s%> and <S%G5059>wonders,<s%> to <S%G635>seduce,<s%> if <S%G1487><s%> it were <S%G1415>possible,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> the elect. <S%G1588><s%>
But take you <S%G991>heed:<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> I have <S%G4280>foretold<s%> you <S%G3956>all<s%> things.

But in <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> that <S%G2347>tribulation,<s%> the <S%G2246>sun<s%> shall be <S%G4654>darkened,<s%> and the <S%G4582>moon<s%> shall not <S%G1325>give<s%> her light, <S%G5338><s%>
And the <S%G792>stars<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> shall <S%G1601>fall,<s%> and the <S%G1411>powers<s%> that are in <S%G3772>heaven<s%> shall be shaken. <S%G4531><s%>

And <S%G5119>then<s%> shall they <S%G3700>see<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2064>coming<s%> in the <S%G3507>clouds<s%> with <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%> and glory. <S%G1391><s%>

And <S%G5119>then<s%> shall he <S%G649>send<s%> his <S%G32>angels,<s%> and shall <S%G1996>gather<s%> <S%G1996>together<s%> his <S%G1588>elect<s%> from the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G417>winds,<s%> from the <S%G206>uttermost<s%> part of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> to the <S%G206>uttermost<s%> part of heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G3129>learn<s%> a <S%G3850>parable<s%> of the <S%G4808>fig<s%> <S%G4808>tree;<s%> <S%G3752>When<s%> her <S%G2798>branch<s%> is <S%G2236>yet<s%> <S%G527>tender,<s%> and <S%G1631>puts<s%> <S%G1631>forth<s%> <S%G5444>leaves,<s%> you <S%G1097>know<s%> that <S%G2330>summer<s%> is near: <S%G1451><s%>

<S%G2532>So<s%> you in <S%G2532>like<s%> <S%G3779>manner,<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> you shall <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things <S%G1096>come<s%> to pass, <S%G1097>know<s%> that it is near, <S%G1451><s%> even <S%G1909>at<s%> the doors. <S%G2374><s%>

<S%G281>Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, that <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1074>generation<s%> shall not <S%G3928>pass,<s%> <S%G3360>till<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things be done. <S%G1096><s%>
<S%G3772>Heaven<s%> and <S%G1093>earth<s%> shall <S%G3928>pass<s%> <S%G3928>away:<s%> but my <S%G3056>words<s%> shall not <S%G3928>pass<s%> away. <S%G3928><s%>

But of that <S%G2250>day<s%> and that <S%G5610>hour<s%> <S%G1492>knows<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man,<s%> no, not the <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are in <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> the <S%G5207>Son,<s%> but the Father. <S%G3962><s%>
Take you <S%G991>heed,<s%> <S%G69>watch<s%> and <S%G4336>pray:<s%> for you <S%G1492>know<s%> not <S%G4218>when<s%> the <S%G2540>time<s%> is.

For the Son of Man is as a <S%G444>man<s%> taking a far <S%G590>journey,<s%> who <S%G863>left<s%> his <S%G3614>house,<s%> and <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> to his <S%G1401>servants,<s%> and to <S%G1538>every<s%> man his <S%G2041>work,<s%> and <S%G1781>commanded<s%> the <S%G2377>porter<s%> to watch. <S%G1127><s%>

<S%G1127>Watch<s%> you <S%G3767>therefore:<s%> for you <S%G1492>know<s%> not <S%G4218>when<s%> the <S%G2962>master<s%> of the <S%G3614>house<s%> <S%G2064>comes,<s%> at <S%G3796>even,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> at <S%G3317>midnight,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> at the <S%G219>cock-crowing,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> in the morning: <S%G4404><s%>
<S%G3361>Lest<s%> <S%G2064>coming<s%> <S%G1810>suddenly<s%> he <S%G2147>find<s%> you sleeping. <S%G2518><s%>
And <S%G3739>what<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you I <S%G3004>say<s%> to <S%G3956>all,<s%> Watch. <S%G1127><s%>
